node_editor.node_graphics_view module¶

class node_editor.node_graphics_view.QNEGraphicsView(scene: node_editor.node_scene.Scene, parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QGraphicsView

Implement custom graphics view that holds the scene containing a background and the nodes.

The logic and mouse events are implemented here
